Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend the John F. Kennedy Center Act to authorize appropriations for the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the John F. Kennedy Center Reauthorization Act of 2007.
Section 2(a)(2)(J)(ii) of the John F. Kennedy Center Act (20 U.S.C. 76h(a)(2)(J)(ii)) is amended by striking Public Works and Transportation and inserting Transportation and Infrastructure.
The John F. Kennedy Center Act (20 U.S.C. 76h et seq.) is amended by inserting after section 6 the following:

subsection.text: The Board is authorized to study, plan, design, engineer, and construct a photovoltaic system for the main roof of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.

Not later than 60 days before beginning construction of the photovoltaic system pursuant to subsection (a), the Board shall submit a report to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure of the House of Representatives and the Committee on Environment and Public Works of the Senate on the feasibility and design of the project.

section.text: Section 13 of the John F. Kennedy Center Act (20 U.S.C. 76r) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking subsections (a) and (b) and inserting the following:

subsection.text: There are authorized to be appropriated to the Board to carry out section 4(a)(1)(H)—
There are authorized to be appropriated to the Board to carry out subparagraphs (F) and (G) of section 4(a)(1)—

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsection (d) as subsection (e), and by adding after subsection (c) the following:

subsection.text: There are authorized to be appropriated to the Board such sums as may be necessary to carry out section 7, with such sums to remain available until expended.

section.text: Nothing in this Act shall be construed to limit or affect the authority or responsibility of the National Capital Planning Commission or the Commission of Fine Arts.
